org.threadly.concurrent.future

Interface ListenableFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The result object type returned by this future
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListenableRunnableFuture<T>, ListenableScheduledFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainedRunnableListenableFuture, ClearOnGetSettableListenableFuture, ExecuteOnGetFutureTask, ImmediateFailureListenableFuture, ImmediateResultListenableFuture, ListenableFutureTask, ScheduledFutureDelegate, SettableListenableFuture

    public interface ListenableFuture<T>
extends java.util.concurrent.Future<T>

    Future where you can add a listener which is called once the future has completed. The runnable will be called once the future completes either as a cancel, with result, or with an exception.

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCallback(FutureCallback<? super T> callback)
      Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed.

      Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed.

      Add a listener to be called once the future has completed.
      void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Add a listener to be called once the future has completed.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Future

        cancel, get, get, isCancelled, isDone

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. The listener from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on, or on the adding thread if the future is already complete. If the runnable has high complexity, consider passing an Executor in for it to be ran on.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete

      • addListener

        void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener,
                 java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. If the provided Executor is null, the listener will execute on the thread which computed the original future (once it is done). If the future has already completed, the listener will execute immediately on the thread which is adding the listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete
        executor - Executor the listener should be ran on, or null

      • addCallback

        void addCallback(FutureCallback<? super T> callback)
        Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. The callback from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on, or on the adding thread if the future is already complete. If the callback has high complexity, consider passing an executor in for it to be called on.
        Parameters:
        callback - to be invoked when the computation is complete
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • addCallback

        void addCallback(FutureCallback<? super T> callback,
                 java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Add a FutureCallback to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. If the provided Executor is null, the callback will execute on the thread which computed the original future (once it is done). If the future has already completed, the callback will execute immediately on the thread which is adding the callback.
        Parameters:
        callback - to be invoked when the computation is complete
        executor - Executor the callback should be ran on, or null
        Since:
        1.2.0
